short_summary: Prove "essential optometry services, on an as when requested basis to inmates at Dorchester Complex as an optometrist. in accordance with CSCs CDs, Health Services Policies, and Guidelines.
description: The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) Health Services require the services of an optometrist for Dorchester Complex Institution in the Atlantic Region. The Contractor (Optometrist) must provide optometry services to inmates and collaborate with the institution's multi-disciplinary health services team that includes, but is not limited to, nurses, physician, dietitians, radiology services, dental, psychiatry, psychology, and other allied healthcare professionals.
